question: With which network SK Telecom of Korea ties up for advanced telecom network in India?
explanation: Bharti Airtel, SK Telecom of Korea ties up for advanced telecom network in India Telecom operator Bharti Airtel has announced a partnership with South Korean telecom operator SK Telecom to build the most advanced telecom network in India. The companies will work towards building an enabling ecosystem for the introduction of these technologies. The company has been offering up to 500 Mbps 4G speed using carrier aggregation technology.
